name: Summon Air Elemental
summary: You have a connection to the Inner Spheres, allowing you to summon an elemental ally.
description:
You have a connection to the Inner Spheres, allowing you to summon an elemental ally. Once per day, you can cast summon elemental as a 5th-level primal innate spell, but the elemental summoned must be an air elemental.Traits

Sylph: Sylphs are planar scions descended from djinn.
